children.name: We are committed to being upfront about our practices and how your data is processed. This policy explains our privacy practices for our Services.

Tenali AI, Inc. may enter into written product or service agreements with business customers that contain specific provisions related to the confidentiality, security or other handling of information. When provisions of a written product or service agreement differ from or conflict with the provisions of this Privacy Policy, the terms of the written agreement will apply. In all other instances, the terms of this Policy apply.

Please take a moment to familiarize yourself with the details provided in this policy to understand how Tenali AI, Inc. handles your information. By using our website or services, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.
If you have any questions or concerns regarding our data practices, please contact us at
1. When you sign up with Tenali Al ◦ When you sign up or leave your email ID and occupation details with us through our website/web app or other means.
When you sign up with Tenali Al
◦ When you sign up or leave your email ID and occupation details with us through our website/web app or other means.
When you sign up or leave your email ID and occupation details with us through our website/web app or other means.
2. By using our services ◦ When you ask Tenali questions in our chat interface, we collect the following information ◦ Your e-mail ID ◦ Questions you ask (we make sure it's anonymized)
◦ When you ask Tenali questions in our chat interface, we collect the following information
When you ask Tenali questions in our chat interface, we collect the following information
◦ Questions you ask (we make sure it's anonymized)
Questions you ask (we make sure it's anonymized)

3. Files you upload ◦ When you upload a file or link to your Knowledge Sources in Tenali, Tenali ingests and stores that data securely. ◦ We use ingested data to help our Al learn and answer your questions
◦ When you upload a file or link to your Knowledge Sources in Tenali, Tenali ingests and stores that data securely.
When you upload a file or link to your Knowledge Sources in Tenali, Tenali ingests and stores that data securely.
◦ We use ingested data to help our Al learn and answer your questions
We use ingested data to help our Al learn and answer your questions
1. We utilize OpenAI to process chats but only after stripping out personally identifiable information and we do not cross train any of the LLMs using customer data.
We utilize OpenAI to process chats but only after stripping out personally identifiable information and we do not cross train any of the LLMs using customer data.
2. To communicate product and company updates over email. You can unsubscribe from these at any time.
To communicate product and company updates over email. You can unsubscribe from these at any time.
3. To help our AI learn and deliver answers that are accurate.
To help our AI learn and deliver answers that are accurate.
1. We never share your personal information with any third party for any reason.
We never share your personal information with any third party for any reason.
2. Anonymized data is shared with our product and engineering teams so they can make Tenali better for you.
Anonymized data is shared with our product and engineering teams so they can make Tenali better for you.
1. Access controls: Admins in Tenali can choose which project Tenali retrieves answers from, so you can maintain the confidentiality of knowledge contained in certain projects.
Admins in Tenali can choose which project Tenali retrieves answers from, so you can maintain the confidentiality of knowledge contained in certain projects.
2. Data separation: We're in the process of obtaining our SOC1 Certificate. Our LLMs do not train on any of your data nor do we share it with any third party.
We're in the process of obtaining our SOC1 Certificate. Our LLMs do not train on any of your data nor do we share it with any third party.

3. Data Privacy 1. We utilize AWS as our cloud service which meets the highest standards of data privacy and compliance. 2. Your data stays yours. Our LLMs do not train on your data, nor do we share it with any third party. 3. Our connection to databases is one-way only. We access data when needed, but these datavases cannot access or pull data from our system.
1. We utilize AWS as our cloud service which meets the highest standards of data privacy and compliance.
We utilize AWS as our cloud service which meets the highest standards of data privacy and compliance.
2. Your data stays yours. Our LLMs do not train on your data, nor do we share it with any third party.
, nor do we share it with any third party.
3. Our connection to databases is one-way only. We access data when needed, but these datavases cannot access or pull data from our system.
. We access data when needed, but these datavases cannot access or pull data from our system.

4. Data Processing: All data processing occurs within the United States at AWS regions on the East and West coasts to ensure high performance, redundancy, and compliance with U.S. privacy regulations.
AWS regions on the East and West coasts
to ensure high performance, redundancy, and compliance with U.S. privacy regulations.
5. Tenali stores data until the termination of the contract.
Tenali stores data until the termination of the contract.
